subject: Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
American Pharoah (Race Horse)
Belmont Stakes
lead_paragraph: Espinoza had been thwarted twice in Triple Crown attempts at Belmont before riding American Pharoah to victory on Saturday.
snippet: Espinoza had been thwarted twice in Triple Crown attempts at Belmont before riding American Pharoah to victory on Saturday.
